skdetail:

Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: The Godrej Smart Appliances skills makes it easy to control and monitor your Godrej connected Appliances using Amazon Alexa. As long as you are registered with Godrej Smart Life App you can enable this skills and link your Godrej Smart Life App account to Alexa for control .
